body.p: We will use Devcon ticket as an example and build a few websites around it.

section.title: Build the issuer website
section.p: This website is the issuer website of the ticket attestation. A Devcon ticket are sent to the users in the form of a : a link that contains some cryptographic attestations. In this case, the cryptographic attestation is the ticket.

This issuer website serves to display the ticket's view, called , so anyone who owns a ticket attestation can see what's in the ticket - such as ticket's number (represented by â„–). It also stores the ticket attestation in its cookie so that when other 3rd party websites wants integrate they can talk to this website.
